SpellModifyFeature.Name: Empowered Spell
SpellModifyFeature.Text: When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one). You must use the new rolls. You can use Empowered Spell even if you have already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
SpellModifyFeature.Spells: Acid or Cold or Fire or Force or Lighting or Necrotic or Psychic or Radiant or Thunder or Poison
